problem.markdown:
1. Time taken for one complete oscillation is called Time Period of the oscillator. (x) True () False
2) Time period of the oscillator is constant for given values of mass, length and initial conditions. (x) True () False
3) Value of Time period depends on initial conditions. () True (x) False
4) Value of time period depends on mass. (x) True () False
5) Value of time period depends on length of the oscillator. (x) True () False
problem.p: 1. Time taken for one complete oscillation is called Time Period of the oscillator.
2) Time period of the oscillator is constant for given values of mass, length and initial conditions.
3) Value of Time period depends on initial conditions.
4) Value of time period depends on mass.
5) Value of time period depends on length of the oscillator.
